publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2677 Mr Brian Monteith: Widening Access Accolade for Stirling and other Universities-That the Parliament congratulates the University of Stirling on coming first in The Times Higher Education Supplement's "Access Elite" list of universities in the UK that perform best at widening access to pupils from poorer backgrounds, based on four criteria, namely (a) inclusive access, (b) low dropout rates, (c) quality of teaching and (d) research and applauds the University of Strathclyde, Glasgow School of Art, Heriot-Watt University and the University of Dundee for taking the next four places to give Scotland a clean sweep of the UK's top five higher education institutions in this survey. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding*, Mr David Davidson*, Alex Johnstone*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*

S1M-2677 Mr Brian Monteith: Widening Access Accolade for Stirling and other Universities-That the Parliament congratulates the University of Stirling on coming first in The Times Higher Education Supplement's "Access Elite" list of universities in the UK that perform best at widening access to pupils from poorer backgrounds, based on four criteria, namely (a) inclusive access, (b) low dropout rates, (c) quality of teaching and (d) research and applauds the University of Strathclyde, Glasgow School of Art, Heriot-Watt University and the University of Dundee for taking the next four places to give Scotland a clean sweep of the UK's top five higher education institutions in this survey. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding, Mr David Davidson, Alex Johnstone, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton
S1M-2677 Widening Access Accolade for Stirling and other Universities (lodged on 31 January 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Murdo Fraser*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2677 Widening Access Accolade for Stirling and other Universities (lodged on 31 January 2002) Richard Lochhead*
S1M-2677 Widening Access Accolade for Stirling and other Universities (lodged on 31 January 2002) Scott Barrie*
S1M-2677 Widening Access Accolade for Stirling and other Universities (lodged on 31 January 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2677 Widening Access Accolade for Stirling and other Universities (lodged on 31 January 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*, Brian Adam*
